sentences.sContent: I burnt all his old letters.
sentences.sCn: 我把他以前的信全烧了。

sentences.sContent: Cars were burned and shops were looted during the rioting.
sentences.sCn: 暴乱期间，汽车被焚，商店遭抢劫。

sentences.sContent: The Grand Hotel had burnt to the ground .
sentences.sCn: 格兰德大酒店被大火夷为平地。

sentences.sContent: Make sure the iron isn’t too hot or you’ll burn the cloth.
sentences.sCn: 注意熨斗温度不能过高，免得烫坏布料。

sentences.sContent: He dropped his cigarette and burnt a hole in the carpet.
sentences.sCn: 他的香烟掉下来，把地毯烫了一个洞。
